name: Lucky Bunny
description:
This is an entry for the Weekly GameJam 141. The Theme was "Good Luck".
Controls:
Keyboard + Mouse or Controller

The game is about a small white bunny. It needs a lot of Good Luck for its dream to become true. Help the bunny by collecting rabbit's feet in the forest and in the cave. But be careful they will fight back.

svenpl: Programming
chilibonbon: Art, Music, Sounds, Programming
